Data Read

```{r}
data <- read.csv('Birth Data.csv')
```

Check Data

```{r}
head(data)
tail(data)
summary(data)
names(data)
ncol(data)
nrow(data)
```

Check Data Types

```{r}
class(data)
```

```{r}
class(data$X2017)
```

Data Wrangling

```{r}
data$X2017

as.numeric(data$X2017)
```

```{r}
as.numeric("31234")

as.numeric("31,234")
```

```{r}
as.numeric(gsub(",", "", data$X2017))
```

```{r}
data$X2017 = as.numeric(gsub(",", "", data$X2017))
data$X2017
```

Bar Plot

```{r}
barplot(data$X2017)
```

```{r}
barplot(data$X2017, names=data$Region, las=3)
```

```{r}
data$X2018 = as.numeric(gsub(",", "", data$X2018))
matrix = rbind(data$X2017, data$X2018)
```

```{r}
barplot(matrix, beside = TRUE, horiz = TRUE, names = data$Region, col = c("blue", "green"), main = "Births in Different Regions of Australia",
        xlab = "Number of Births", ylab = "Region", las = 1)

legend("topright", legend = c("2017", "2018"), fill = c("blue", "green"))
```
